newsitem.title: UK: Dudley Jenkins up on director share purchase.
newsitem.headline: Dudley Jenkins up on director share purchase.

text.p: Shares in database and direct mail group Dudley Jenkins Group Plc leapt after the company announced a purchase of 8,500 shares by director Barry Gold and members of his family.
The stock was up 18p at 225-1/2 by 1408 GMT. No reason was given for the purchase.
